author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
In this video, I’ll show you exactly how I waterproof a shower window niche with Kerdi Board products so it’s 100% leak-proof. I'll show you my exact method to make sure water never gets through.If you found this video helpful, subscribe. Watch all of the videos from this project 👉🏼https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL34cQkzKfXWbw0cvItwuNkLOpdJF7gu18

title: How to Waterproof a Shower Window Niche (NO LEAKS)
